text: Clinton J. Hill (January 4, 1932 - February 21, 2025) was a U.S. Secret Service agent who worked under five United States presidents, from Dwight D. Eisenhower to Gerald Ford. Hill is best known for his act of bravery while in the presidential motorcade on November 22, 1963 when United States President John F. Kennedy was assassinated in Dallas, Texas. Hill died at his home in Belvedere, California on February 21, 2025, at the age of 93. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2025 deaths Category:People from North Dakota Category:John F. Kennedy
title: Clint Hill (Secret Service)
